players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am the detective and I found out Bob is the mafioso."
You: "I am a villager and I believe Bob is the mafioso based on Diana's information."
Diana: "I will investigate Alice and Charlie to determine if either of them is the mafioso. If neither are, then Bob must be the mafioso."
Bob: "Nothing to say. I'm just a villager."
You: "I am a villager and I believe Bob is the mafioso based on Diana's information. However, if Bob is not the mafioso, I will support Charlie as he was found dead last night."
